verses.verse: And as He is traveling out of the temple grounds, one of His students says to Him, "Teacher, look! What stones! And what buildings!"
And when Jesus answered, He said to him, "Do you see these huge buildings? A stone will not in any way be left on a stone that will not in any way be torn down."
And as He sat in the Mountain of the Olives directly facing the temple grounds, Peter, James, John, and Andrew were asking Him by themselves,
"Tell us when these things will be, and what the indicator is whenever all these things are going to be totally finished."
When Jesus answered them, He began to be saying, "See that no one misleads you.
You see, many will come based on My name, saying, 'I am Him,' and they will mislead many.
Whenever you hear wars and much hearsay about wars, do not be alarmed. You see, it is necessary for them to happen, but it is not the conclusion yet.
You see, a nation will rise up on a nation and an empire on an empire. And there will be earthquakes throughout places, and there will be famines and agitations. These are the beginnings of pains.

You must look out for yourselves. You see, they will turn you in to councils. And in synagogues you will be beaten. And you will be led before leaders and kings on account of Me for a witness to them.
And first, it is necessary for the good news to be spoken publicly to all the nations.

And whenever they lead you, turning you in, do not worry beforehand what you will speak or even care for it, but whatever is given to you in that hour, this speak. You see, you are not the ones speaking, but the Spirit, the Sacred Spirit, is speaking.
A brother will turn a brother in for death; and a father, a child. And children will stand up on parents and put them to death.
And you will be people that are hated by everyone because of My name, but the person who persists to do what is right to the conclusion, this person will be rescued.

Whenever you see the disgusting thing of the uninhabitedness, the thing stated by Daniel, the preacher, (in Daniel 11:31 and 12:11) that he has stood where it is not necessary (the person reading this must be aware), at that time the people in Judea must escape into the mountains.
The person on the housetop must not climb down into the house, nor go in to take anything from his house.
And the person that is in the field must not return back to the things left behind to take his robe.
What a tragedy it will be to the women having a baby in their womb and the women nursing in those days.
Be praying so that your escape will not happen during a storm.
You see, those days will be this type of hard times, such as has not happened from the beginning of the creation (that God created) until the present and will not in any way happen.
And if the Master did not halt the days, every physical body would not be rescued, but because of the select people, whom He selected, He halted the days.
And at that time, if someone says to you, 'Look, the Anointed King is here, or look there,' do not trust it.
You see, fraudulent anointed kings and fraudulent preachers will get up and give indicators and miracles, with the intent to be misleading, if possible, even the select people away.
You must look out. See, I have stated all things to you beforehand.
But in those days after those hard times, the sun will be made dark, the moon will not give its glow,
there will be the stars of the sky that fall out, and the abilities, the ones in the heavens, will be disturbed.
And then they will see the Son of the Person coming in clouds with much ability and magnificence.
And then He will send out His angels, and He will bring His select people together in one place from the four winds (compass directions), out of one edge of the earth to the other edge of heaven.
Learn the illustration from the fig tree. Whenever its branch already becomes tender and it sprouts the leaves out, you know that the summer is near.
In this way also, whenever you see these things happening, know that it is near, at the door.
Amen, I tell you that this generation will not in any way pass up to the point that all these things happen.
The sky and the earth will pass, but My messages will not in any way pass.
About that day and hour, no one knows except the Father, not the angels, the ones in heaven, nor the Son.
Look out! Don't go to sleep! And pray! You see, you do not realize when the appointed time is.
As a person gone from the area, who left his house and gave the authority to his slaves and to each his own work, and to the doorkeeper he demanded that he should stay awake,
so stay awake. You see, you do not realize when the master of the house is coming: evening, or middle of the night, or at rooster-crowing time (3:00-6:00 a. m.), or in the morning.
When he comes unexpectedly, he will not find you sleeping, will he?
What I say to you, I say to everyone, stay awake."
